title: 095: The Rise of Women with Danette May
itunes:title: 095: The Rise of Women with Danette May
description:
There has been a major shift since 2012. We have woken up and realizing that we are all connected. Through supporting one another, we rise.

In this episode, author and public speaker Danette May and I discuss:
-How losing her son and having only $45 to her name was the awakening she needed
-How to become friends with other women, even if you’ve always been a tomboy
-The importance of having a community of sisters and tribe
-How she was an original part of Lori Harder’s mentorship group, which she wrote her book on!

Join Danette May’s Rise event in Colorado Oct 12-14: https://therisedenver.com/

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

Get 35% off your order of Youveda supplements at youveda.com with code “sahara”

Receive 15% off Four Sigmatic at foursigmatic.com with code "sahara"

Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Discover your Dharma with my free quiz at https://iamsahararose.com/

Connect with me for daily Ayurvedic and modern spiritual wisdom at: Instagram.com/iamsahararose
Facebook.com/iamsahararose Twitter.com/iamsahararose

Order My Books Eat Feel Fresh + Idiot's Guide to Ayurveda: https://www.iamsahararose.com/books
